column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Every year for the Royal Water Festival authorities distribute OK brand condoms to a large number of people free of charge.------As people from the provinces make their way to Phnom Penh to party and have a good time
column4: sex will inevitably come. That’s why authorities are offering free condoms to prevent sexually transmitted diseases
column6: the National Authority for HIV / AIDS (NAA) will launch its campaign to distribute 500
column7: 000 condoms to citizens at the Water Festival on 10-12. November. According to Hor Nam Leng
column8: deputy director of the National AIDS Authority
column9: quoted by the Ministry of Information.------AREY NEWS
